titles.title: Influenza Vaccine Emergency Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for emergency distributions of influenza vaccine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 3/7/2001--Introduced. Influenza Vaccine Emergency Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act, as amended by Public Law 106-505, to subject influenza vaccine manufacturers and distributors in interstate commerce to specified emergency authorities regarding the supply and distribution of such vaccines in the case of an emergency declared by the Secretary of Health and Human Services.Requires payment by the Secretary to the parties as otherwise provided for by contract.
